description: This file defines a React component for a login page, handling user authentication via email and password with optional 'Remember me' persistence. It manages user input, displays errors, and navigates upon successful login.

methods.name: Login
methods.description: Main React component rendering the login form, handling user input, form submission, and navigation logic.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, performs login, manages errors, and navigates upon success.
